April 23, 2011 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Vienna Nights
University of Adelaide (Elder Hall), Adelaide, South Australia, Australia Second draw in placing order: 3, 8, 1, 7, 6, 9, 2, 4, 5, 10.
Held on 22nd and 23rd April.
Best instrumentalist: Patrick Mudge (euphonium, Kew Band Melbourne) Best soloist in set test: (tied) David Barker (cornet, Kew Band Melbourne) and Kevin Joughin (cornet, K & N Spring Gully Brass)
